item.title: ‘I have a degree in economics’: I’m 70, earn $250K a year and have $3.7 million in investments. Is it time to retire?
item.description: “I have a home worth $1.3 million with $900,000 in equity. I have not paid it off as I have a 3% interest rate.”

item.title: 15 stocks of companies set to grow sales twice as fast as the S&P 500 — analysts love them
item.description: Stocks passing this screen have 12-month upside potential of up to 33% as implied by consensus price targets.

item.title: Is there any reason to pick individual stocks? ‘I haven’t come up with one yet,’ this market legend says.
item.description: Is there any reason to pick individual stocks? Says DFA’s David Booth: “I haven’t come up with one yet.”

item.title: Buy these stocks as railroad-merger talk heats up, analyst says
item.description: CSX’s stock has been upgraded at TD Cowen, which sees the railroad operating benefiting from consolidation in the rail sector.
